item.title: Instructions on how to burn an Ubuntu installation DVD on macOS
item.description: To create an Ubuntu installation DVD on macOS, you will need the following: An Ubuntu ISO file. Download the Ubuntu of your choice from here A blank DVD Ensuring the authenticity of an Ubuntu ISO The download can be verified to ensure the data integrity and authenticity of the file. The easiest way to burn an Ubuntu ISO – the file you just downloaded – on a DVD, is by right clicking on the file in the Finder.
